title: I feel my E5373s-155 getting hot after long hours usage. Is there safety concern?
answer:
A:

Like most other electronic devices, E5373s-155 get hotter during charge or big data transfer. It is a quite normal phenomenon if working in regular office environment. Even if it works in hot environment, E5373s-155 will automatically safety protections if its temperature too high, please rest assured that the use of device.  (Please donâ€™t use E5373s-155 in close environment; it will cause poor signal and high heat of your E5373s-155)
